definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Them more readily removable by laundry water and detergents form the fibres.
sentences.chinese: 它們越容易被洗衣水和洗衣粉從纖維上洗去。

sentences.english: This kind of laundry detergent can clean the most difficult smudges.
sentences.chinese: 再難洗的污漬都難不倒這種洗衣粉。

sentences.english: I put too much detergent in the washer.
sentences.chinese: 我在洗衣機裏放了太多的洗衣粉。

sentences.english: There's a nasty mark on the tablecloth , and I don't think the usual washing powder will take it out.
sentences.chinese: 桌布上有一塊污跡，我想用普通洗衣粉是洗不掉的。

sentences.english: One box of laundry detergent can last six months.
sentences.chinese: 一盒洗衣粉可以使用六個月。

sentences.english: They are bringing out a new brand of soap powder next month.
sentences.chinese: 他們要在下月投放市場一種新牌洗衣粉。

sentences.english: It was said that washing powders containing enzymes remove stains more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 據說加酶洗衣粉除污更有效。

sentences.english: A new oscillographic titration method for the determination of phosphorus content in laundry powder is described.
sentences.chinese: 報告了洗衣粉中磷測定的示波滴定新方法。

sentences.english: The qualities for both phosphate and phosphate free detergents are analyzed here.
sentences.chinese: 對我國生產含磷與無磷洗衣粉的質量進行了分析。

sentences.english: Welcome and thank you for visiting Dongguan Dabu Washing Supplies Factory.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您惠顧東莞市麻涌大步洗衣粉廠。

sentences.english: "Gige" Detergent powder is another important product of our plant.
sentences.chinese: 烷基苯廠的另一個重要產品是“加佳”牌洗衣粉。

sentences.english: Can I borrow some detergent from you?
sentences.chinese: 我可以向你借點洗衣粉嗎？

sentences.english: This kind of detergent came into popular use last year.
sentences.chinese: 這種洗衣粉去年曾被廣泛使用。

sentences.english: Buy washing powder in boxes, not liquid in plastic containers.
sentences.chinese: 購買盒裝的洗衣粉，不要塑料桶裝的洗衣劑。

sentences.english: He bought a jumbo packet of washing-power.
sentences.chinese: 他買了一包特大型包裝的洗衣粉。

sentences.english: So smeary , can touch washing powder of low density with soft cloth water will brush.
sentences.chinese: 如是油污，可用軟布沾一點低濃度洗衣粉水來擦。
